channel.title: Need help with saving objects
channel.description:
Server Source: projet 16 v6 How urgent: 5 not really that urgent
Details: I need a way I can save my objects when I build them with my construction
Other information: ive tried to make a buffer write to save it but it failied havent got any idea how to make it save in savemoreinfo can someone please help [br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2007, 12:04:40 AM[/size][hr]anyone?? :( :( :( :(

item.title: Need help with saving objects
item.dc:creator: @axl axl
item.description:
@axl wrote:

ok i don’t think thats possible , take is you spawn npc’s ingame with ::npc + code
if you would restart the server the npc"s are gonne same for objects i guess

if you want to save them , then just add them in a globalobjects.cfg file or
you can add globalobjects in youre client ( with the right voids )

Read full topic
